### Stemming: 
Normalizing words into its base form or rootform 

### Errors in Stemming:
There are mainly two errors in stemming – Overstemming and Understemming. 

### Overstemming: 
Occurs when two words are stemmed to same root that are of different stems.

### Under-stemming: 
Occurs when two words are stemmed to same root that are not of different stems.
